item.title: Mine npc saying text dont save
item.dc:creator: @pista pista
item.description:
@pista wrote:

I write into mpchandler:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 153) {
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Type ::shopping to get on shopping island!”;
}
}

and i save it close now i open compile,log in,now i spawn ::npc 153 and its saying that text but if i log out and close
compile and again open compile there is no mine npc 153 please help

pleaassss

Read full topic
